sense.def:
Kar je
low
, od dna do vrha meri zelo malo.

seg.quote: ...a low brick wall.
...a low table.
...low hills.

sense.def:
Nekaj je lahko
low
, kadar je blizu tal ali dna nečesa.

seg.quote: She made a low curtsey.
I asked him to fly low over the beach.
She saw the scar low on his spine.

sense.def:
Ženska obleka ali bluza, ki je
low
, je taka, pri kateri je vrat ali zgornji del prsi gol.

seg.quote: ...a low neckline.
Her dress was cut low in front.

sense.def:
Low
pomeni majhen po količini, vrednosti ali stopnji.

seg.quote: ...workers on low incomes.
...low expectations.
...a low tar cigarette.

sense.def:
Izraz
low
lahko uporabljamo s številkami, kadar navajamo približno količino. Na primer: če je število
in the low twenties
, je več kot dvajset in manj kot trideset.

seg.quote: The temperature is in the low eighties.

sense.def:
Kadar je zaloga nečesa
low
, nam tistega ni več veliko ostalo.

seg.quote: We're a bit low on claret.

sense.def:
Kadar je kakovost ali raven nečesa
low
, je slaba.

seg.quote: ...a low standard of living.
...low-grade material.

sense.def:
Low
uporabljamo za opisovanje oseb, ki so blizu dna določene lestvice.

seg.quote: ...a junior executive of a fairly low grade.
...the lowest 85 per cent of the working population.

sense.def:
To have a low opinion of someone
pomeni nekoga ne odobravati ali ne marati.

Z izrazom
low
opisujemo osebe ali dejanja, ki jih ne odobravamo.

seg.quote: ...mixing with low company.
Well I'm not doing that. I haven't sunk that low.

sense.def:
Zvok, ki je
low
, je globok.

seg.quote: ...a long low note on the horn.

sense.def:
Tudi tih zvok lahko opišemo z izrazom
low
.

seg.quote: Smithy spoke to him in a low and urgent voice.
He turned the radio on low.

sense.def:
Svetloba, ki je
low
, je bleda in nebleščeča.

To be feeling low
pomeni biti nesrečen.

A low
je najslabša ali najnižja raven, ki jo je nekaj sploh kdaj doseglo.

seg.quote: Output was at a record low.
She'll have to lie low for a couple of years.
